title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 210.25 - Repairs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 210.25 - Repairs

State Regulations

The promoter shall have an attendant capable of making
emergency repairs, corrections and adjustments to the ring, cage or fighting
area, the lights and other necessary fixtures available at all times during a
contest or exhibition. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
210.25

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
